page.title: 06RECREATION BMX BIKE RACING
page.content:
{BMX}stands for Bicycle Motor X (cross). It is a light-weight{bike}in various designs used for{freestyle and{racing.}There are two kinds of {wheels,}with plastic or alloy spokes, and strong grip{tyres.}The bike has two strong{brakes.}Costa brakes make you stop if you pedal backwards. Pedalling with your feet moves the chain which drives the rear wheel. {Prices}range from Â£1OO to Â£500.
I am Christer Warren. Next week I am competing in the{European champion- {ship}final. I am ranked{7th}in the world for my age group (10) and am a member of Poole Panthers, a local{BMX {club.}I have won 1O1 trophies in BMX competitions all over the world. On 9 August I am entering the{world {championship}in Canada.
